Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Authorizes the governor to remove a county clerk from office for failing to process drivers' licenses submitted by undocumented immigrants
Summary: Authorizes the governor to remove a county clerk from office for failing to process drivers' licenses submitted by undocumented immigrants and deems such failure as neglect of duties; and directs the department of motor vehicles to establish a mobile unit to process such applications.
LawCode: Amd §33, Pub Off L; amd §525, County L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law and the county law, in relation to authorizing the governor to remove a county clerk from office for failing to process drivers' licenses submitted by undocumented immigrants; and directs the department of motor vehicles to establish a mobile unit to process such applications
